name: Train Invaders
description:
The train is under attack by Red Scarf Skulls! Sheriff, you have to save us! 

Embark on Space Invaders-inspired arcade journey that challenges a lonesome Sheriff against a gang of hoodlums. 

Controls:

  • Left Arrow/A  - Move Left 
  • Right Arrow/D - Move Right 
  • Space - Action/Shoot
  • ESC - Exit Level

Downloadable Files Run Better

  • Linux  execute using  "java -jar ./Train_Invaders.jar"
  • Windows execute using double click
